readable.title: 241345639_1556a883b1
readable.content: There is a college player being tackled in a game . The two football players in white jerseys and purple pants tackle the player in the red jersey . Three football players are tackling a red uniformed football player during a football game . Three football players in purple uniforms try to tackle a player in a red uniform . Two football players try to tackle a player of the opposite team .
